name: Tropical Fish Shop 2
description: A diverse gameplay combines several genres of “Match 3”, “Hidden object”, “Sim”, and various mini-games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1000 Mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 Storage: 111 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game stinks worse then the fish. 7/7
